_sText:
Map made by: 
v33n aka catfood

e-mail: 
v33n@hotmail.com

website:
http://83.98.167.131/~catfood/ (in future it will become www.v33n.nl)

map stats:
2 bomspots
max 64 man
33 custom models
17 custom textures
map size 21.4mb 
2 easter eggs

description / story:
terrorists discoverd a secret base on an island somewhere on the ocean.
In the secret base there doing experiments with aliens, 
and now there planning to blow the place a new hole!
so the Counter-Terrorists have to stop the terrorists before they blow up the entire secret base!

Installation:
Just put the map (de_crimson) in your "steam/steamapps/youracount/counter-strike source/cstrike/maps

special thx:
my css clan hf. (hellforce)
